00027    template <typename Data, int M, int N>
00028    class FMatrix : public Matrix<Data>
00029    { 
00030    
00031       using Matrix<Data>::data_;
00032       using Matrix<Data>::capacity1_;
00033       using Matrix<Data>::capacity2_;
00034    
00035    public: 
00036    
00040       FMatrix();
00041 
00045       FMatrix(const FMatrix<Data, M, N>& other);
00046 
00050       ~FMatrix();
00051 
00055       FMatrix<Data, M, N>& operator = (const FMatrix<Data, M, N>& other);
00056 
00063       template <class Archive>
00064       void serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version);
00065 
00066    private:
00067 
00069       Data fixedArray_[M*N];
00070    
00071    };
00072 
00073    /*
00074    * Default constructor.
00075    */
00076    template <typename Data, int M, int N>
00077    FMatrix<Data,M,N>::FMatrix() 
00078      : Matrix<Data>()
00079    {
00080       data_ = fixedArray_;
00081       capacity1_ = M;
00082       capacity2_ = N;
00083    }
00084    
00085    /*
00086    * Copy constructor.
00087    */
00088    template <typename Data, int M, int N>
00089    FMatrix<Data,M,N>::FMatrix(const FMatrix<Data, M, N>& other) 
00090      : Matrix<Data>()
00091    {
00092       data_ = fixedArray_;
00093       capacity1_ = M;
00094       capacity2_ = N;
00095       for (int i = 0; i < M*N; ++i) {
00096          fixedArray_[i] = other.fixedArray_[i];
00097       }
00098    }
00099    
00100    /*
00101    * Destructor.
00102    */
00103    template <typename Data, int M, int N>
00104    FMatrix<Data,M,N>::~FMatrix()
00105    {}
00106 
00107    /*
00108    * Assignment.
00109    */
00110    template <typename Data, int M, int N>
00111    FMatrix<Data,M,N>& 
00112    FMatrix<Data,M,N>::operator = (const FMatrix<Data, M, N>& other) 
00113    {
00114       //Check for self assignment
00115       if (this == &other) return *this;
00116 
00117       // Copy elements
00118       for (int i = 0; i < M*N; ++i) {
00119          fixedArray_[i] = other.fixedArray_[i];
00120       }
00121 
00122       return *this;
00123    }
00124    
00125    /*
00126    * Serialize a FMatrix to/from an Archive.
00127    */
00128    template <class Data, int M, int N>
00129    template <class Archive>
00130    void FMatrix<Data,M,N>::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00131    {
00132       for (int i = 0; i < M*N; ++i) {
00133          ar & fixedArray_[i];
00134       }
00135    }
